title: Sony Vaio Logo Font
content:
Hi,

What font could this be?

Thanks,

comments.content: Seriously. Do you really expect this to be a font?

Probably Not. But,what font is this then?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421234933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/strip_personalize_en_3712.jpg)

ITC Avant Garde Gothic.

- Mike Yanega
